<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Trade</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var iniAmount = 2500;
var iniCurrency = 'INR';

function currency(cost, iniCurrency) {
    var conv = new sn_currency.GlideCurrencyConverter(iniCurrency, 'USD');
    var convAmount = conv.setAmount(cost);
	var finAmount = convAmount.convert();
    var convertInAmount = finAmount.getAmount();
	return convertInAmount;
}

var convertInAmount = currency(inpAmount , inpCurrency);
var convertNomAmount = currency(noAmount , nomCurrency);

if ((parseInt(convertInAmount) || (parseInt(convertNomAmount)) ) > parseInt(highValueTrade)){
	//

}
currency(iniAmount);]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2024-04-23 10:42:38</sys_created_on>

        <sys_policy/>
